#openwsn wiki homepage

= Introduction =

OpenWSN means Open Wireless Sensor Networks. It's a fundamental platform for WSN research and applications. It is initiated by TongJi University. The current version of OpenWSN hardware is based on LPC213x ARM7 + TI/Chipcon cc2420.
